questions.question: What does Karana compare the Aleut to as it comes nearer to the island?
What is the name of Karana's brother?
How old is Ramo?
How old is Karana's sister, Ulape?
How does Karana describe her brother's eyes?

choices.answer: His eyes are as brown as the roots that grow on the island
His eyes are blue like the sea and wide open
They are black like a lizard's and often look sleepy

questions.question: How do the men of Galas-at prepare for the coming ship?

choices.answer: Carrying their weapons, half stand on the shore, half hide
They run to greet the ship happily, with goods to trade
They all hide among the stones, all are afraid
They arm themselves and they all run to the shore

questions.question: What do the crew members of the ship do after it lands in Coral Cove?

choices.answer: Six men row to shore and one runs out shouting
They bring gifts to the people of Ghalas-at

questions.question: What is the name of the Russian captain from a previous hunting trip?
Why did the Russians come to Coral Cove?

choices.answer: They came to hunt sea otter and camp on the island

questions.question: Why does chief Chowig advise his people not to visit the Aleut camp?

choices.answer: He says the Aleuts might kidnap women and children
He says the Aleuts carry disease
He tells them the Aleuts carry powerful, evil magic
He says the Aleut language and ways are not their ways

questions.question: Why does each person of Ghalas-at have two names?

choices.answer: One is for visitors, and the other is for tribe use
One is a birth name, never used. The ither is a magic name
The real name is secret, and the other is common

questions.question: How do the constant winds affect the land?

choices.answer: It makes movement on the island difficult
It brings dolphins closer to the beach
It drives sea bass on to the beach
It makes the hills smooth and causes the trees to be short

questions.question: Why do the villagers need an escape plan?

choices.answer: They have no food and water now
They can not climb down the cliffs
The increasing storms are making the island unlivable
They need to leave if the Aleuts return

questions.question: What do the villagers fear in Chapter 6?

choices.answer: The water springs flooding the village
The raging storms from the south

questions.question: Why have white men come to Ghalas-at?

choices.answer: To take the villagers from Ghalas-at

questions.question: Who vainly packs earrings and blue clay into their luggage?

choices.answer: The girl with the long black hair

questions.question: How do the villagers feel about leaving the Island of the Blue Dolphins?

choices.answer: They are angry they have to go
Fearful about the destination, but happy

questions.question: Who does Nanko think has run ahead of the group to board the ship?
Why did Ramo want to go back to Ghalas-at?
Who is the reason someone jumps overboard?
